help_desc_setup_ai: /setup_ai Purpose: Configure or update AI settings (API Key, system prompt, model) for this group. The process will continue in your DM (private chat). Who: Admins only, in group chat.
help_desc_get_ai_config: /get_ai_config Purpose: Sends the AI settings for this group to your DM. It includes the API Key (masked), system prompt, model, and who configured it. Who: Admins only, in group chat.
help_desc_reset_ai_config: /reset_ai_config Purpose: Deletes the AI settings for this group (API Key, system prompt). You will be asked for confirmation in DM. Who: Admins only, in group chat.
help_desc_set_language: /set_language Purpose: Changes the bot's display language for this group. The bot will communicate using the language you choose. Who: Admins only, in group chat.
help_desc_newchat: /newchat Purpose: Clears the AI conversation memory for this group. Useful if you want to start a new topic with the AI. Who: Admins only, in group chat.
help_desc_set_ai_triggers: /set_ai_triggers Purpose: Configure how users invoke the AI (e.g., enable/disable /ask_ai command, bot mention, or create a custom prefix). Configuration is done in DM. Who: Admins only, in group chat.
help_desc_set_welcome: /set_welcome Purpose: Configure an automatic welcome message for new members. You can create your own message using specific codes or enable a message from the AI. Configuration is done in DM. Who: Admins only, in group chat.
help_desc_help: /help Purpose: Displays this help menu, containing information about available commands and their usage. Who: All users, in group or DM.
help_desc_ask_ai: /ask_ai [your question] Purpose: Directly ask the AI. Type your question after the command. Who: All users, in group chat (if AI is set up & trigger is active).
help_desc_mention_ai: @BotUsername [your question] Purpose: Mention the bot then type your question to interact with the AI. Who: All users, in group chat (if AI is set up & trigger is active).
help_desc_custom_prefix_ai: [custom_prefix]your question Purpose: If an admin has set a custom prefix (e.g., '!', 'ai:'), use it before your question to talk to the AI. Who: All users, in group chat (if AI is set up & custom prefix trigger is active).
